alert.note: Alert for Greater Vancouver Area (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued February 12 at 8:00AM PST until February 12 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY BELOW 500 FEET... * WHAT...Visibility less than one mile in dense fog below 500 feet. * WHERE...In Oregon, Greater Portland Metro Area. In Washington, Greater Vancouver Area. * WHEN...Until noon PST today. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of dense fog have formed over many areas within the Portland/Vancouver Metro area, especially near the larger rivers.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
